about.title: About Us
about.description1: PT Equityworld Futures ("EWF") is committed to being the best investment partner in the futures trading sector. With excellent service, EWF continues to expand and now has a network of 7 operational offices in Jakarta (2 Offices), Surabaya (2 Offices), Semarang, Manado, and Cirebon.
about.description2: Established in 2005, PT Equityworld Futures is an official brokerage company member registered with the Commodity Futures Trading Regulatory Agency (BAPPEBTI), Jakarta Futures Exchange (JFX), and Indonesia Clearing House (KBI).

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To develop and advance Commodity Futures Trading and provide a positive impact on the Indonesian economy.

mission.title: Mission
items: Promote promotional and educational programs about the futures trading industry
Provide hedging instruments with KYC principles
Introduce the futures trading industry through higher education and seminars
Prepare qualified human resources through training programs

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Uphold honesty and professionalism in every service

customerSatisfaction.title: Customer Satisfaction
customerSatisfaction.description: Provide the best service for customer satisfaction

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Always comply with applicable laws and regulations

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continue to innovate in product and service development

logos.aspebtindo: Indonesian Futures and Commodity Exchange Association
